text: District-level and divisional-level committees have been constituted for monitoring the manual scavenging. In a release issued here on Sunday, S. Palanisamy, District Collector, said that the district administration has taken up rehabilitation programme by extending a relief of Rs. 40,000 to each of those involved in manual scavenging. Action would be taken against those found employing manual scavengers.
title: Manual scavenging: committees set up
